value:
$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Is this...$k$p$WmMPID_ルピナス,ch00_28_Lupine_F_Normal,Face|Dökkálfheimr...the nightmare realm...
This is a bad place...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|The land of nightmares, hm?
But...this smell...$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|*sniff sniff* Oh! That IS a very nice
smell...very sweet!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Yes, it's like...nectar.$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face_Smile|It's enchanting... My body even feels
lighter...softer...$k$pAlfonse...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Yes?$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face_Smile|I...love you. I...want to be closer
to you...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Hu-huh?!$k$p$WmMPID_ルピナス,ch00_28_Lupine_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Alfonse... I love you. I want to be
closer to you...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Alfonse...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|S-snap out of it, all of you! This must
be the work of the dökkálfar!$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMEID_プルメリア,ch00_25_Plumeria_F_Normal,Face|I am Plumeria, and this is a world of
my creation, the Lewd Dream...$k$pWishing to be loved... Longing,
yearning, DYING for it...$k$pAll you mortals are the same.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Hrk... Get ready to fight!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Th-that's right, Alfonse! I knew you
wouldn't be defeated so easily.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Happy to see...you're your normal
self as well, Commander.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Please, keep your distance...
It's difficult to fight it when
you get too close...$k$pI just have to focus on...the mission!
...And the reward! Now, let's put
these nightmares to bed!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMEID_プルメリア,ch00_25_Plumeria_F_Normal,Face|There's pleasure in surrendering to
your own indulgences. Wouldn't you
rather be...happy for a change?$k$pI'll return with more dream nectar
from Lady Freyja, and we can try
again, hm? Until then...$k$p

$WmMPID_ザカリア影,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|M-Mother... It's dark...$k$pWh-where are you, Mother?
...Mother?$k$pPlease... I need you...$k$p$Fo1500,255,255,255,255|$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|$Fi1500|Was that...a voice?$k$pIt sounded...like a sad little girl...
I thought I... Hm.$k$p...It seems to have stopped now.
How strange.$k$p$Sbs150|
